page.title: 14A Day at Upottery School
page.content: On Monday mornings our teacher does the register and the dinner money, while we usually do handwriting or reading.We then discuss or write until first play. When we come in from play we all get on with some maths and almost everyone is on different stages in the maths books. We do maths until dinner time and when we have finished we all go out to play for about an hour and ten minutes. After we come in we do some project work which involves English, art, maths,science and all sorts of things. The project might be about Post Offices, flowers and birds or mapwork.Sometimes we go out on visits. We read,write,draw,make models and do experiments. We go swimming or our teacher reads a story as the final part of the day.
